[]

Edited July 31, 2019 by Thehalospartansa
[]

No offense, I really don't care what you do we your genitals, but I think you people need to change your attitude. Things like these are only detrimental to your cause. It does you more harm than good as you end up being characterized and stereotyped as "b.ing sissy pants".

Just my 2 cents.

I don't play that game, however, considering how bad people who are against such relationships can be, I don't think it would be wise to add it in, as it would just lead to unnecessary hate for those who would go into said relationships.

Disclaimer: I do not hold any views against anyone, no matter what sexual orientation they are, nor do i hold views against anyone over their beliefs.
